title: Our Shared Vision
excerpt: "A future where every Pakistani, regardless of geography or income, receives timely, precise, and world-class cancer care driven by their unique genetic profile."
content: "A future where every Pakistani, regardless of geography or income, receives timely, precise, and world-class cancer care driven by their unique genetic profile."

title: Government Support Request
content:
Co-Sponsorship: Official endorsement of the 150,000+ WGS as a National Genome program Initiative
Policy Framework: Establishment of independent Governance & Ethical Board
Funding: Public-private matching grant for infrastructure setup (Phase 1).

title: Ready for Immediate Implementation
content: Site: site allocation for the infrastructure and Building

title: Next Steps: 30-Day Plan
content:
Month 1: Constitute Joint Steering Committee (MoNHSRC + Precision Omics).
Month 1: Finalize Memorandum of Understanding (MoU).
Month 2: Site selection for National Genomic Center (Islamabad).
Month 2: Site Preparation
Month 3: Launch Phase 1 infrastructure development.
